description.value: Value set combining the distinct value sets that the zib NursingIntervention binds to for NL-CM:14.2.2 Intervention. This value set as such does not exist in the zib but facilitates referencing all these value sets at the same time. * 2020-11-12 [ZIB-1252](https://bits.nictiz.nl/browse/ZIB-1252) - The concept Intervention has a reference to NIC as supported codesystem for coding interventions. This option has been deprecated making SNOMED CT the only supported option.
